price: Sọ pé: “Dájúdájú Wọ́n kọ̀ fún mi láti jọ́sìn fún àwọn tí ẹ̀ ń pè lẹ́yìn Allāhu.” Sọ pé: “Èmi kò níí tẹ̀lé ìfẹ́-inú yín. Bí bẹ́ẹ̀ kọ́ nígbà náà, mo ti ṣìnà, èmi kò sì sí nínú àwọn olùmọ̀nà (tí mo bá tẹ̀lé ìfẹ́-inú yín).”
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي نُهِيتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۚ قُل لَّآ أَتَّبِعُ أَهۡوَآءَكُمۡ قَدۡ ضَلَلۡتُ إِذٗا وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
